    Interface ITypeRelations

    Encapsulates objects under specific relations as values for a TypeRegister entry.

    Namespace: Shared.Services.Registry
    Assembly: Model.dll
    Syntax
    public interface ITypeRelations

    Properties

    | Edit this page View Source

    IsEmpty

    Indicates whether the instance is internally empty.

    Declaration
    bool IsEmpty { get; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    True if the set of object-relation values is empty; otherwise, false.
    | Edit this page View Source

    this[RegistryRelation]

    Retrieves the object in a TypeRegister entry given its relation type.

    Declaration
    object? this[RegistryRelation relation] { get; }
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    RegistryRelation relation

    The relation under which the object was registered.
    Property Value
    Type Description
    object

    The related object or, if none, null.
